children.name: anger
children.sourceText: Cry again unto the Lord, and it may be that he will turn away his anger from them who are our friends, that he confound not their language.

children.name: are
children.sourceText: Cry again unto the Lord, and it may be that he will turn away his anger from them who are our friends, that he confound not their language.

children.name: be
children.sourceText: Cry again unto the Lord, and it may be that he will turn away his anger from them who are our friends, that he confound not their language.

children.name: carry
children.sourceText: Go and inquire of the Lord whether he will drive us out of the land, and if he will drive us out of the land, cry unto him whither we shall go. And who knoweth but the Lord will carry us forth into a land which is choice above all the earth? And if it so be, let us be faithful unto the Lord, that we may receive it for our inheritance.

children.name: confound
children.sourceText: Cry unto the Lord, that he will not confound us that we may not understand our words.

children.name: cry
children.sourceText: Cry unto the Lord, that he will not confound us that we may not understand our words.

children.name: have
children.sourceText: Suffer them that they may have a king.
